item.description:
If you haven't come to one of these events yet, this meeting is the perfect time to begin! While you're there, join us for a cold beverage, some yummy appetizers, meet new people, find out how you can contribute to the good fight for our environment. This meeting - open to all - will have Sierra Club activists who will explain the projects were working on, from Alternative Energy, Politics, Legislation, Outings, Parks, plus many other Sierra Club subjects. For more information, contact meetup@sierraclubmass.org or call me at 617-218-7794. My name is Rajeev.

See you on the 6th!

group.name: Greater Boston Sierra Club Environmental Meetup Group

item.name: June Sierra Club Meetup!
